SELECT product_type, SUM(product_price*order_cnt) AS sales, DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM product p INNER JOIN orders o ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '배송완료'
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 month) AND NOW()
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 month) AND NOW()
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 month) AND NOW()
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW()
GROUP BY product_type, DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ASC
